/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a few wispy clouds. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Pedestrians can be seen as well, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow.
